metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1201 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Privoxy before 3.0.22 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(file descriptor consumption) via unspecified vectors.  NOTE: theprovenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solelyfrom third party information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.24-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.24-1').
